Freelance Php Developers London

03 May 2006

Experienced freelance PHP developers needed for web-based magazine, based in Kensington, London.

We’re an independent online magazine - launched in August 2005, we have a growing readership and exciting plans for the future. We need experienced freelance PHP developers on an ongoing basis to help develop new systems to support the editorial process as well as forthcoming commercial initiatives.

If you have strong PHP, enjoy coding to W3 standards in CSS and XHTML, have great communication and interpersonal skills, and are able to work on a flexible, as-needed basis, we’d love to hear from you. There is the possibility of remote working some of the time.

See http://thefirstpost.co.uk/pages/recruitment/php_developers.php for more information
